channel.title: Minecraft Modding Overview on
channel.description: Recent content in Minecraft Modding Overview on

item.title: Block
item.description: Block Create a block mod element, click the green plus and click Block Enter a new name for the block, there are certain restrictions to follow make sure they follow them.

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Day 1 - Intro, First Block, and Ore Play Minecraft until everyone arrives and gets logged in, just have them log in or use our accounts for singleplayer.

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Day 2 - Tools, Armor, Tree, Wood, Biome There’s a lot happening on this day, but it all goes fairly quick Play Minecraft until everyone arrives.

item.title: Day 3
item.description: Day 3 Notes Custom Tool Effects - 30 mins Have the ninjas follow along or watch as you create a pickaxe that gives you haste while you hold it.

item.title: Day 4
item.description: Day 4 MC Modding Camp Potion - 30 mins Make a potion item mod element Name the different potions at the top, add effects at the bottom.

item.title: Day 5
item.description: Day 5 Minecraft Mods explanation How do Minecraft mods actually work? Minecraft mods are written in a language called Java, as is Minecraft itself.

item.title: General Camp Notes
item.description: Minecraft Modding Camp - Code Ninjas It’ll be useful for every sensei in the camp to have messed around in MCreator at least one time and have gone through themselves and figured out how to do most of the things the camp will cover.

item.title: Setting up Computers
item.description: Programs needed Java (newest version) Minecraft Launcher MCreator Forge (file is downloaded and then it installs into Minecraft) The process Search for Java, if it’s not there install it.

item.title: Your First Block
item.description: Textures Textures in MCreator are made using an MS Paint style of drawing canvas. To make a texture, first click the Resources tab on the left side !
